attributes.action: prevent any further payments to Adam Applegarth, former CEO of Northern Rock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Northern Rock has posted £168 million loss  in 2007 compared to £627 million profit in 2006 a fall of £795 million.

£30 billion of taxpayers money, (£500 from every man woman and child in the UK) has been used to save it.

Nick Leeson went to prison for losing £1200 million at Barings 

Alan Applegarth however has a £2.2 million pension pot and is due to be paid £760,000 (£63,000 per month) for achieving the effective failure of Northern Rock.

2000 people are likely to lose their jobs on probably much less generous terms.

Whatever the terms of his employment his behaviour and the end results must make them void and he should suffer the consequences
